pr_title: Move Snapshot Status Related Method to Appropriate Places

timeline.message:
Move Snapshot Status Related Method to Appropriate Places

Lots of thnigs living in `SnapshotsService` for no reason other than
that `SnapshotsService` provides the `RepositoriesService`.
Cleaning this up to directly use `RepositoriesService` in the relevant
transport actions and by that shortening the already very complex `SnapshotsService`.

timeline.author: ywelsch

timeline.bodyText: Couldn't the repository have been removed after we checked the repo exists? I think we should throw a RepositoryMissingException here instead of NullPointerException
timeline.author: ywelsch

replies.bodyText: In repository(repositoryName) we do actually throw RepositoryMissingException. The assertion is a little pointless but I don't think we're ever throwing an NPE here
replies.author: original-brownbear
